title: Reliable Sources
description: An Alex Bernier MysteryAlex Bernier lives in the sleepy university town of Gabriel in upstate New York, and writes for the Gabriel Monitor. When her boyfriend, Adam, is found dead at the bottom of a local gorge, Alex is convinced that his death could not have been suicide, and so she beings an investigation of her own, following clues that lead her on a dangerous trail, ultimately to the murderer himself.
author: Beth Saulnier
